page.title: 20Favourite Pastimes<cont'd>
page.content: CHILDREN ADULTS PASTIMES 1 2 3 1 2 3 ROUNDERS 4 2 5 - - - CRICKET 2 1 1 - 1 1 CYCLING 5 3 3 3 - - HIKING 1 2 - 3 13 3 READING 4 2 2 15 - 7 WATCHING SPORT - 2 - - 1 AEROBICS - - - 1 - - COMPUTERS 3 7 3 - - - ICE SKATING 2 2 2 - - - BOARD GAMES 2 - 3 - 1 - GARDENING - - - 1 7 5 COOKING - - - - - 2 BIRDWATCHING- - 1 1 - 1 KEEP-FIT - - - 1 1 - Children voted tennis to be the most popular with swimming and T.V. coming 2nd and 3rd.Adults voted reading to be the most popular with hiking and gardening coming 2nd and 3rd.
